title: Greg Tarzan Davis
summary: Gregory Davis, Jr. (born September 25, 1993), better known as Greg Tarzan Davis is an American actor. Born in New Orleans he began in theater, moved to Los Angeles, and starting his acting career. In 2022, he played the role of Javy "Coyote" Machado in the  Top Gun: Maverick film. In 2021, he received a recurring role on ABC's series Grey’s Anatomy. He also had a supporting role in the horror film Tales from the Hood 2 (2018).
